mapper.select: select p.`id` as id, p.`create_time` as create_time, p.`update_time` as update_time, p.`type_id` as type_id, p.`code` as code, p.`name` as name, p.`cost_amt` as cost_amt, p.`remark` as remark, p.`enabled` as enabled, t.`name` as type_name, pt.`content` as content from `product` p left join `dict_product_type` t on p.type_id = t.id left join `product_txt` pt on p.id = pt.id order by create_time desc
